text: Wisdom is a 1986 American crime romance movie directed by and starred Emilio Estevez, Demi Moore, Tom Skerritt, Veronica Cartwright and Charlie Sheen. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * Category:1980s English-language movies Category:1986 crime movies Category:1986 romance movies Category:American romance movies Category:American independent movies Category:Movies about bank robbery Category:Movies about dreams Category:1986 independent movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies set in Minnesota Category:Movies composed by Danny Elfman Category:American crime movies
title: Wisdom (movie)
